scripts.default: npm i dotenv && npm i --save-dev @nuxtjs/tailwindcss && npm i @headlessui/vue && npm i @heroicons/vue && npm i @nuxtjs/composition-api
scripts.init: git init && git add . && git commit -m 'Initialising' && git branch -M main
scripts.postinit: git remote add origin https://github.com/Kastholm/GrusvejDK.git && git push --set-upstream origin main
scripts.predev: git pull && npm i && npm cache verify
